oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bioacademy 2008 - Proceedings
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
Knowledge management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Within the topic “New Developments in Science and Research in Organic Agriculture”, the Conference for Practitioners put emphasis on the transfer of up to date information directly into practice, while the Scientific conference enabled scientists of various specialisation to exchange the latest research findings from this agricultural system reaching into the related areas of landscape and the environment.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Sarapatka, Borivoj and Samsonova, Pavlina (Eds.) (2008) Bioacademy 2008 - Proceedings. [Sborník Bioakademie 2008.] Bioinstitut, Olomouc, Czech Republic. Proceedings of Bioacademy 2008, 3.– 5. 9. 2008.
